item.title: Rasha Thadani grooves with ‚Äòadopted mother‚Äô Tamannaah Bhatia and Vijay Varma; fans say ‚ÄòAaj Ki Raat meets Uyi Amma‚Äô - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rasha Thadani enjoys an Uyi Amma moment with Tamannaah Bhatia and Vijay Varma, who the star kid calls her ‚Äòadopted parents‚Äô

Date: Jan 18, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Rasha Thadani, daughter of Raveena Tandon, recently debuted in the film industry with her movie Azaad. The screening saw support from her close friend, Tamannaah Bhatia, who praised Rasha's song Uyi Amma. The duo later showcased their chemistry as they danced together on the said track.

  • Rasha Thadani began her film journey with Azaad, which premiered recently.
  • Tamannaah Bhatia, a close friend, has emerged as Rasha's biggest supporter, referring to her as her 'adopted mother.'
  • Vijay Varma joined Tamannaah and Rasha in an Instagram video, singing and dancing to Uyi Amma.
  • Fans commented positively on their performance, drawing comparisons to popular songs.
‚ÄúWhen Aaj ki raat meets Uyi Amma ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüôå‚Äù

This delightful interaction between Rasha, Tamannaah, and Vijay highlights their strong friendship and the supportive nature of their bonds in the entertainment industry.

item.description:

item.title: Unstoppable with NBK: Ram Charan‚Äôs unknown act of kindness wins hearts - 123telugu
item.description:
Ram Charan's Heartwarming Act of Kindness on Unstoppable with NBK

Publication Date: Latest Telugu cinema news

Megapower Star Ram Charan is celebrated not just for his acting but also for his altruistic actions, which often go unnoticed. Recently, an episode of Unstoppable with NBK showcased a touching story of his support to a devoted fan who faced personal challenges.

  • Ram Charan learned about a fan from Chittoor district, who regularly donates blood and was struggling due to his wife's illness.
  • Charan and his wife Upasana arranged for free medical treatment for the fan's wife at a prominent hospital in Hyderabad.
  • She received ICU care for 17 days, with daily visits from specialists, all covered by Ram Charan.
  • The fan expressed his gratitude and shared his emotional journey during the latest episode, which went viral on social media.
‚ÄúCharan‚Äôs act of kindness reflects his genuine love for his fans and leaves a lasting impact.‚Äù

Ram Charan's kind gesture has not only helped a fan in need but also reinforced his reputation as a compassionate star.

item.title: Hrithik Roshan recalls the tough time when an attempt of assassination was made on Rakesh Roshan: 'I was - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Hrithik Roshan recalls the tough time when an attempt of assassination was made on Rakesh Roshan: 'I was losing faith in people, in goodness, in the world'

Publication Date: October 2023  Source: Times of India

In a poignant recount, Hrithik Roshan discussed the traumatic experience surrounding an assassination attempt on his father, Rakesh Roshan, which significantly impacted his view on humanity.

  • Hrithik revealed that the incident made him question his faith in goodness and people.
  • The event had a profound emotional effect on the Roshan family, altering their perspectives.
  • Hrithik emphasized the necessity of resilience during tough times.
"I was losing faith in people, in goodness, in the world."

This revelation highlights the emotional toll that violent events can have on families and the importance of support in overcoming such experiences.

item.title: Diljit Dosanjh's Panjab 95 to release internationally next month without any cuts, but not in India - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Diljit Dosanjh's Panjab 95 to Release Internationally Next Month Without Cuts

Date: Jan 18, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

The much-anticipated film Panjab 95, featuring Diljit Dosanjh, is set for a global release on February 7 without any cuts, although it will not be available in India.

  • The film is directed by Honey Trehan and produced by RSVP Movies.
  • Panjab 95 centers on human rights activist Jaswant Singh Khalra.
  • The film will explore the human rights violations and disappearances during Punjab's militancy period.
  • It was previously scheduled to premiere at the Toronto International Film Festival but was removed from the line-up.
  • Jaswant Singh Khalra mysteriously disappeared in 1995 while investigating mass cremations in Punjab.
‚ÄúPanjab 95 releases in Cinemas Internationally only on 7th February. PS Full Movie, No Cuts #ChallengetheDarkness,‚Äù Diljit Dosanjh announced.

This movie's release is a significant moment, shedding light on important historical issues related to human rights abuses in Punjab.

item.title: Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collection Day 6: Nandamuri Balakrishna‚Äôs Film Is Running Out Of Steam, Might Fail To Recover Its Cost? - Koimoi
item.description:
Daaku Maharaaj Box Office Collection Day 6: Nandamuri Balakrishna‚Äôs Film Is Running Out Of Steam

Publication Date: [Insert date here] | Source: Koimoi

Daaku Maharaaj, starring Nandamuri Balakrishna in the lead role, kicked off its theatrical run on a strong note despite competition. However, it is now losing momentum due to another film's strong performance.

  • The film started strong with earnings of 25.35 crores on day 1.
  • It saw a downward trend in collections over the following days, earning 12.80 crores on day 2, 12.25 crores on day 3, 9.75 crores on day 4, 6.25 crores on day 5, and 4.20 crores on day 6.
  • Total collections over 6 days stand at 70.60 crores.
  • The film's budget is reportedly 100 crores.
‚ÄúOverall, the Nandamuri Balakrishna starrer has earned 70.60 crore net at the Indian box office in 6 days.‚Äù

Given its current trend and competition, the future performance of Daaku Maharaaj remains uncertain.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 44: The Allu Arjun starrer makes less than the new films 'Emergency' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection day 44: The Allu Arjun starrer makes less than the new films 'Emergency', 'Azaad' on Friday; crosses Rs 1200 crore

Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

The film 'Pushpa 2' has managed to cross Rs 1200 crore but has performed less than new releases 'Emergency' and 'Azaad' on Friday.

  • 'Pushpa 2' reaches a significant milestone of Rs 1200 crore in its box office collection.
  • The film's performance was lower than that of new releases.
  • The competition from newly released films is affecting 'Pushpa 2's audience turnout.
'Pushpa 2's collection indicates a robust performance yet highlights the challenges posed by new entrants in the market.'

The continued success of 'Pushpa 2' demonstrates the strong fanbase of Allu Arjun, but it also reflects changing box office dynamics with new competitors on the rise.

item.title: Azaad box office collection day 1: Rasha Thadani, Aaman Devgan's debut film with Ajay Devgn opens at ‚Çπ1.5 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Azaad Box Office Collection Day 1: The film earned over ‚Çπ1 crore on Friday in India. Check out the numbers here.

Date: January 18, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Azaad, directed by Abhishek Kapoor, had a decent opening at the box office, earning ‚Çπ1.50 crore net in India on its first day, marking it as the biggest opener for newcomer films after the Covid-19 pandemic.

  • The film stars Rasha Thadani and Aaman Devgan, marking their Bollywood debuts.
  • It explores the bond between a young stable boy and a horse.
  • Azaad had an overall 15.02% Hindi occupancy on its opening day.
‚ÄúHe really grew on me as a person. He is one of the sweetest people I know. Now, he is truly my best friend.‚Äù - Rasha Thadani about Aaman Devgan

The film has been noted for its limited but shining sequences involving the titular character. Rasha and Aaman are seen as promising newcomers, though they still have room for growth in their acting skills.

item.title: NBK, Jr NTR pay tributes to NTR on death anniversary - Greatandhra
item.description:
Tributes Paid to N.T. Rama Rao on 28th Death Anniversary

Publication Date: January 18, 2024 Source: Great Andhra

Tollywood actors N. Balakrishna, Jr NTR, and Kalyan Ram paid tributes to former Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N. T. Rama Rao on his 28th death anniversary at NTR Ghat in Hyderabad.

  • Jr NTR and Kalyan Ram laid wreaths at their grandfather's samadhi.
  • Balakrishna honored his father, recognizing his contributions as a leader and actor.
  • Tributes emphasized NTR's dedication to the welfare of the poor and his political influence.
  • Andhra Pradesh Minister Nara Lokesh also paid respects, recalling NTR's reforms.
  • Calls for NTR to receive the Bharat Ratna award were noted.
‚ÄúNTR was not only the greatest actor but also dedicated himself to serving people, especially the poor and downtrodden.‚Äù - Balakrishna

The tributes commemorated NTR's lasting legacy in both cinema and politics, highlighting his impact on Telugu self-respect and governance.

item.title: NBK, Jr NTR pay tributes to NTR on death anniversary.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Balakrishna, Jr NTR pay tributes to NTR on death anniversary

Date: January 18, 2024 Source: Great Andhra

On the 28th death anniversary of N. T. Rama Rao, Tollywood actors N. Balakrishna and Jr NTR paid floral tributes at NTR Ghat in Hyderabad, commemorating his legacy as an actor and leader.

  • Jr NTR was joined by Kalyan Ram to lay wreaths at their grandfather's samadhi.
  • Balakrishna emphasized NTR's dedication to serving the poor and his impactful political legacy.
  • Minister Nara Lokesh also paid his tributes, advocating for NTR to receive India's highest civilian award.
Balakrishna remarked, "NTR was not only the greatest actor but dedicated himself to serving people, especially the poor and downtrodden."

This year's tribute saw a significant gathering of fans, highlighting NTR's lasting impact on Telugu culture and politics.

item.title: Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box Office Collections: Venky starrer continues its Blockbuster run - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box Office Collections: Venky Starrer Continues Its Blockbuster Run

Published on: Jan 18, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

The film Sankranthiki Vasthunam is on track to cross Rs. 100 crore in the Telugu states, with projections exceeding Rs. 105 crore. The film continues to perform strongly at the box office, particularly in Coastal Andhra.

  • The film grossed over Rs. 16 crore in the Telugu states on Friday.
  • It recorded a total of Rs. 79 crore in its first four days in India.
  • Strong performances were noted especially in Vizag and Godavari districts.
  • Nizam and Ceded regions are expected to see an increase in revenue as the holiday period concludes.
  • The film aims to surpass previous Sankranti blockbusters.
Sankranthiki Vasthunam will be crossing Rs. 100 crore in the Telugu states on Sunday, likely over Rs. 105 crore.

The film's performance has been remarkable, and if current trends continue, it could set new box office records for the Sankranti season.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18 Winner POLL: Karan Veer Mehra, Vivian Dsena, Eisha Singh, Chum Darang, Avinash Mishra and Rajat Dalal; Which contestant among top 6 should win show? VOTE - PINKVILLA

item.title: Dakota Johnson whispers wishes in Nandi's ears as Chris Martin watches her at Mumbai's Shri Babulnath Temple - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Dakota Johnson and Chris Martin Visit Mumbai's Shri Babulnath Temple

Date: Jan 18, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Dakota Johnson and musician Chris Martin were spotted visiting the Shri Babulnath Temple in Mumbai, where Dakota followed a Hindu tradition by whispering wishes to Nandi's statue.

  • Dakota wore a printed black suit and wrapped a dupatta, while Chris opted for a blue kurta and black pants.
  • The couple has been exploring Mumbai as Chris is in the country for Coldplay's tour.
  • In Hindu mythology, Nandi is known as the mount of Lord Shiva, and devotees whisper wishes to him.
  • Coldplay is set to perform in Mumbai on January 18, 19, and 21 as part of their Music of the Spheres World Tour.
‚ÄúWhispering into Nandi's ear is a Hindu tradition, where devotees pray and make wishes.‚Äù

This visit highlights not only Dakota and Chris's relationship but also their engagement with local traditions during their stay in India.

item.title: RIP Aman Jaiswal: The last Insta post of the 22-year-old TV actor who lost his life in a road accident me - The Times of India
item.description:
RIP Aman Jaiswal: The Last Insta Post of the 22-Year-Old TV Actor Who Lost His Life in a Road Accident Melts Hearts

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

The article commemorates the late Aman Jaiswal, a 22-year-old TV actor who tragically passed away in a road accident. It highlights his last Instagram post, which touched the hearts of many fans.

  • Aman Jaiswal was loved by fans and colleagues alike.
  • His last Instagram post is gaining attention, reflecting on his life and career.
  • The article includes reactions from fans expressing their grief.

‚ÄúHe was a bright star who shone too briefly.‚Äù

The loss of Aman Jaiswal is a poignant reminder of the fragility of life and the impact young talents can have in their short time with us.
